p: The constructed dataset of empirical transmission rates is included in a panel regression model, where log transmission is the dependent variable and climate variables are the independent variables. Our main regression specification includes a suite of controls: specifically, county-by-month dummies to remove potential confounding from location-specific seasonal aggregation such as school semesters, and county-by-year dummies to remove confounding from location-specific episodic events. As in the descriptive analysis, we include both precipitation and specific humidity in our baseline regression model. Results for temperature are included in Supplementary Fig.Â 10 and mirror an expected logarithmic functional transformation of the humidity result.
